content:
The bombs flew through Sumy, Kharkiv, Donetsk and Zaporizhzhya regions.

About it in the morning reportsMarch 8 reportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces.

The settlements of Babelivka of Sumy region have suffered during the last day of aviation strikes; Vovchansk, Ivanivka, Stepova Novoselivka of Kharkiv region; Yampolivka, Andreevka, Grigorivka, Toretsk, Friendship, Konstantinovka, Yar, Ivanivske, Novobakhmutivka, Ocheretine, Umanskoye, Krasnogorivka, Novomykhailivka, Konstantinovka, Coal, Donetsk region; Robot, small Tokmachka of Zaporizhzhya region.

The enemy fired from the artillery of 150 settlements of Ukraine under the fire were the villages and cities of Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Lugansk, Donetsk, Zaporizhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Kherson and Mykolaiv regions.

Unfortunately, Russian terrorist attacks are injured and killed among civilians.

Multi -storey and private homes, as well as other civil infrastructure, were destroyed and damaged.

In total, 86 combat clashes took place over the past day. In total, the enemy caused 4 missile and 74 aircraft strikes, and fired 101 firing of rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

BeforeIt became knownthat the enemy fired at 10 Ukrainian regions.
title: During the day, the enemy caused air strikes to 4 regions of Ukraine
